for Model in self.cov_models:
    for dim in self.dims:
        model = Model(dim=dim, var=2, len_scale=10, anis=[0.5, 0.2], angles
            =[0.4, 0.2, 0.1])
        detrended = krige.Detrended(model, self.cond_pos[:dim], self.
            cond_val, trend)
        field_1, __ = detrended.unstructured(self.grids[dim - 1])
        field_1 = field_1.reshape(self.grid_shape[:dim])
        field_2, __ = detrended.structured(self.pos[:dim])
        self.assertAlmostEqual(np.max(np.abs(field_1 - field_2)), 0.0, places=2
            )
        for i, val in enumerate(self.cond_val):
            self.assertAlmostEqual(field_2[self.data_idx[:dim]][i], val,
                places=2)
